name: Rest to Rant
description: Welcome to Rest to Rant, where you come to rest your hunger and rant about how good the food is! We serve mouthwatering grilled meals, perfect for family feasts or solo cravings. Whether you're in for a quick bite or a full-blown food adventure, we've got you covered. Come hungry, leave ranting (about how amazing it was)! 🍗🔥😆
